bio.tr: Aylin Kaya, İstanbul Üniversitesi Hukuk Fakültesi mezunudur. Ticaret Hukuku ve Sözleşmeler Hukuku alanlarında uzmandır.
bio.en: Aylin Kaya graduated from Istanbul University Faculty of Law. She specializes in Commercial Law and Contracts Law.

education.tr:
İstanbul Üniversitesi, Hukuk Lisans, 2005
Galatasaray Üniversitesi, Özel Hukuk Yüksek Lisans, 2008
education.en:
Istanbul University, LLB, 2005
Galatasaray University, LLM in Private Law, 2008

practice.tr: Ticaret Hukuku, Sözleşmeler Hukuku, Şirketler Hukuku
practice.en: Commercial Law, Contracts Law, Corporate Law

memberships.tr: İstanbul Barosu, Türk Ticaret Hukuku Derneği
memberships.en: Istanbul Bar Association, Turkish Commercial Law Association
